product_name: Winning Moves Pass The Pigs Dice Game - Pig Party Edition
long_description: The Winning Moves Pass the Pigs Pig Party Edition serves up more pigs, more points and more fun. Go hog wild with this pig-tastic game! Game includes 8 pig dice, 30 cards, rule sheet and a zippered fabric carry case.
short_description: The Winning Moves Pass the Pigs Pig Party Edition serves up more pigs, more points and more fun. Go hog wild with this pig-tastic game!
